_description: A prayer or charm for protection against evil, introducing ‘In nomine patris’ — one quatrain

CamEmm27.Transcription:
Al fram eh vuele þingeme schulde Iesus þat mayMid
                    cristes rode toknigeih Mark y me today
CamEmm27.Note:
‘In nomine patris’ in English in this MS, ‘In
                    þe name of þe fader and of þe sone and of þe holy goste
                    Amen’ (f. 162va).
CamEmm27.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 28.
